text: The 1950-51 Austrian Football Championship was organized by the Austrian Football Association. The Staatsliga B, which was also professionally run, served as a substructure to the Staatsliga A. Only clubs from Vienna, Lower Austria, Burgenland, Upper Austria, Styria played in it. The Tyrolean club, Polizei Innsbruck, played additionally . For the remaining clubs from the west and Carinthia , which did not play professionaly, the Tauernliga (Salzburg and Carinthia) and the Arlbergliga (Tirol, Vorarlberg) were organized on an amateur basis. ==Final table== Pl.
